description: This is a Java source file defining a Spring REST controller named UserController, which manages user-related API endpoints such as user registration, update, retrieval, and listing.

classes.name: UserController
classes.description: Controller class providing REST API endpoints for user management such as registration, updating, and retrieval.

methods.name: createUser
methods.description: Handles POST requests to register a new user in the system.

methods.name: updateUser
methods.description: Handles PATCH requests to update an existing user's information by user ID.

methods.name: readUsers
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a paginated list of users.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific user's information by ID.
